title: Hello
body:
Hi everyone, just wanted to mention and sorry if this is the wrong place to put this thread on but I had a game last night with a Sylas on my team and Yasuo on the other. Sylas was saying that he stole Yasuo's ult but he couldn't use it or get rid of it. I haven't played him but is there a timer on how long the ult is kept? Or is it there until you use it?

I only ask because no one on our team had a knock up so literally, he couldn't use it xD (Not to sound mean haha)

If that is the case I think they should fix that or do something about it because that would be very frustrating IMO.

Thanks for reading.

replies.body:
I would say that part of playing Sylas is knowing which Ults to steal.

There did used to be a keystone "Courage of the Colossus", and it was part of playing the game, to know if you could proc it or not before equipping it into a match. Nobody seemed to consider that a bug...
Well, I'm not sure if it's a bug or more of a misunderstanding lol
He could also use it in the Blast Cones, I think.
But is that all he's limited to though? I think that needs a major hotfix xD
Doesn’t Sylas’ stun have a tiny knock knock up?
I don't think so, I think it's just a short stun duration. I'm not so sure though cause I don't really play the champ or own lol.

he can use it without the knock up lmao 
not sure but all sylas' in my team used it with no problem

Sylas's E2 has a knockup.

Sylas can hold onto a stolen ult for up to two minutes.

This information is available on the wiki: https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/Sylas
